title: Ensure autoplay library background video on landing page

requirements.summary: Add autoplaying background video to landing page hero section with proper layering and fallback
acceptanceCriteria: Opening the landing page immediately begins playing a library video in the hero section background without requiring user interaction.
The video plays automatically, is muted, loops continuously, and fills the full hero section with object-cover sizing.
The video is layered behind all hero text and CTA buttons, which remain readable and clickable.
A semi-transparent dark overlay is visible between the video and the hero content.
On browsers where autoplay is blocked or the video fails to load, the hero background image is shown as a fallback.

file_operations.description: Modify the hero section to include an autoplaying background video element. Add a <video> element with autoPlay, muted, loop, and playsInline attributes, sourcing frontend/public/assets/generated/library-hero-bg.mp4. Position the video absolutely to fill the hero section (w-full h-full object-cover) and layer it behind all hero content using z-index. Add a semi-transparent dark overlay div between the video and the hero text content to ensure readability. Set the poster attribute on the video to reference the existing hero background image as a fallback. Ensure all existing hero text, CTA buttons, and navigation remain fully visible and functional above the video layer.
